title: React Shopping List
about: React shopping list. Add you item and remove it or remove the whole list at once.

title: Crystal Game
about: This is a guessing game using numbers hidden behind four crystals displayed as buttons on the page. Win the game if your total score matches the shown random picked number

title: Trivia Game
about: Answer 10 questions. You have only 15 seconds for each question. See the right answer if you are wrong.

title: Psychic Game
about: The computer randomly picks the letter and the user has to guess which letter the computer chose.

title: Train Time
about: Train Schedule app that uses Firebase and Moment.js to show the name, destination, frequency, next arrival and when the next train is coming.

title: Foodie-Leaks
about: Search for the recipes by ingredient or pick the cusine or category. Get the ingredient list and recipe instructions.

title: Friend-Finder
about: The Friend-Finder app asks the user to fill up the questionare at the beginning and then finds another person with the most compatible answers.

title: Burger
about: Burger app uses MVS framework and MySQL database. Lets the user to create and 'eat' the burger.

title: Mongo-scraper
about: Scrape an articles from New York Times Food edition, like them and comment

title: React-Clicky-Game
about: It's a react-based memory game. Click on each image only once to reach the maximum score. Do not repeat!

title: GIFTastic
about: Javascript/ HTML Gif fetching application that uses the GIPHY API to fetch users choice of GIFs. User can click to play/ stop GIFs.
